Producer: Raphael Berdugo, Viola Prestieri, Riccardo Scamarcio, Anne-Dominique Toussaint
Screenwriter: Valeria Golino, Francesca Marciano, Valia Santella
Synopsis: A woman (Jasmine Trinca) who secretly helps terminally ill patients end their lives meets an old man (Carlo Cecchi) who wants to die because he's sick of life.
Title: Honey
